kpi_info.title: M5210C9
kpi_info.use: Unavailable Seconds (UAS):Counts the number of seconds for which the interface is unavailable. The interface is defined unavailable from either the beginning of 10 contiguous SES and/or a defect. An interface is available again after a 10-second absence of all defects and SES. While the interface is unavailable, the only count that is incremented is UAS. Defect: LOS on Ethernet interface only. UPDATED : The counter is incremented for every second when the interface is in a period of unavailable time. Unavailable time starts when either a defect is active or at the beginning of 10 contiguous severely errored seconds (SES). Unavailable time ends at the beginning of 10 contiguous not severely errored seconds and the absence of all defects. The value of the counter is updated every second.
